title: News24.com | Coronavirus: Pietermaritzburg youth donate groceries to street hawkers as lockdown bites
description: Some street hawkers sell sweets outside schools, some braai mealies in town, others are recyclers, but now they can't earn a living to buy food due to the Covid-19 lockdown.
content:
Across the country street hawkers have been prohibited from trading during the national lockdown to slow the spread of Covid-19.
"It is hard for everyone but for them it's harder," says Sibongumusa Zuma.
He organised youths to donate groceries to 10 street … [+1662 chars]
